title: ...Can Be Gold: Simone Part 4
description: The Simone of old no longer exists. She has transmogrified into a woman with whom she can’t reconcile but who she must eventually come to accept. This new Mona is stronger, sexier and with an innate power that she’s only just beginning to understand.For Zane, she has put her very soul on the line. She has dragged herself to the outer limits of her principles and has entered uncharted territory. All for the man who helped form this new creature that calls herself Simone Barranquet.But was it worth it? Is he worthy of her sacrifice?And what of Jake? Is he manipulating her or does he really share the same aspirations? When two enemies unite and become allies, the man at the center of the battle is key.But will Zane concur? Is he strong enough to accept them both, to have what he’s never known he’s always wanted? 58,500 wordsCan Be Gold... is the FINAL novella in Simone's FOUR part story.Reading Fall Into LoveCrazy Little Thing Called LustAll That GlittersCan Be GoldOver 400 pages of Naughty Nookiness!
author: Serena Akeroyd
